name: Breakthrough (Cenphon)
description:
My Entry for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam!

-------------------Instructions-------------------

Click to use the blade, but only when charged. 

Move mouse to swing blade around.

Hit the only one real enemy to win!

If you hit any other enemies, the fakes, 2 more will spawn!

Begin playing with the > button within the menu.

To get out of the info section, press the < button at the top left.

More information can be found by pressing the ? button within the menu.

-------------------Credits-------------------

Code - Cenphon with Unity and Visual Studio c#

Art - Cenphon with PiskelApp

Music - Cenphon with Auxy

As you can tell this is all made by me.

-------------------Notes-------------------

Please give feedback with the comments!
